metadata.title: S&P 500 Major Market Events - 2025
metadata.description: Real market-moving events that shaped the S&P 500's performance in 2025
metadata.source: Authentic market research and historical data

events.title: Fed Holds Rates at 4.25%-4.50%
events.description: Federal Reserve maintains target rate range, citing balanced economic conditions and stable inflation trends.
events.correlation: Fed meeting drove moderate rally on dovish tone

events.title: S&P 500 Reaches 2025 High of 6,144.15
events.description: Index hits year-to-date high amid strong earnings season and optimistic economic outlook.
events.correlation: Peak before major correction begins

events.title: Fed Maintains Dovish Stance
events.description: Federal Reserve signals patient approach to rate policy, markets respond positively to measured guidance.
events.correlation: Dovish commentary supports continued rally

events.title: Trump Announces Massive Tariff Package
events.description: Former President Trump announces plans for 145% tariffs on China, 25% on Canada and Mexico if elected, triggering market panic.
events.correlation: Tariff announcement triggers massive sell-off beginning

events.title: Global Markets in Freefall
events.description: International markets follow U.S. lead as tariff fears spread globally, commodity prices surge.
events.correlation: Continued selling pressure from tariff fears

events.title: Corporate Earnings Warnings Increase
events.description: Major multinational corporations issue profit warnings citing potential tariff impacts on supply chains.
events.correlation: Fundamental concerns amplify technical selling

events.title: Banking Sector Under Pressure
events.description: Regional banks face stress as trade war fears impact lending outlook and economic growth projections.
events.correlation: Sector rotation accelerates broader market decline

events.title: Market Hits 2025 Low: 4,982.77
events.description: S&P 500 crashes to yearly low of 4,982.77, marking 18.9% decline from February peak in historic tariff-driven sell-off.
events.correlation: Climax of tariff crisis selling reaches oversold levels

events.title: 90-Day Tariff Pause Announced
events.description: Trump campaign announces 90-day pause on tariff implementation for 'further economic analysis', triggering historic single-day recovery.
events.correlation: Historic +9.52% single-day gain on tariff pause news

events.title: Relief Rally Continues
events.description: Markets extend recovery as investors reassess tariff timeline and economic impact projections.
events.correlation: Follow-through buying after oversold bounce

events.title: Fed Maintains Steady Course
events.description: Federal Reserve holds rates steady amid uncertainty over trade policy direction and economic outlook.
events.correlation: Steady policy supports market recovery momentum

events.title: US-China Trade Agreement Breakthrough
events.description: Preliminary agreement reached to reduce tariff proposals to 25% on China with gradual implementation timeline.
events.correlation: Counter-intuitive selling on 'buy rumor, sell news' dynamic

events.title: Tech Earnings Beat Expectations
events.description: Major technology companies report strong Q4 2024 results, driving sector outperformance.
events.correlation: January momentum supported by earnings strength

events.title: Inflation Data Shows Moderation
events.description: January CPI data comes in below expectations, supporting Fed's patient approach to policy.
events.correlation: Inflation moderation supports continued rally

events.title: Strong Jobs Report
events.description: February employment data shows robust job creation and wage growth, economic resilience continues.
events.correlation: Strong employment supports economic optimism

events.title: Earnings Season Begins Positively
events.description: Q1 2025 earnings season kicks off with better-than-expected results from major banks.
events.correlation: Positive earnings support post-crash recovery

events.title: Manufacturing PMI Rebounds
events.description: April manufacturing PMI shows expansion after tariff uncertainty decline, signaling economic resilience.
events.correlation: Economic data confirms recovery momentum

events.title: Energy Sector Rallies
events.description: Oil prices stabilize and energy stocks lead market higher on improved demand outlook.
events.correlation: Energy leadership drives broader market gains

events.title: Consumer Confidence Hits High
events.description: January consumer confidence reaches multi-month high on improved economic outlook.
events.correlation: Consumer optimism supports market momentum

events.title: Housing Market Shows Strength
events.description: February housing starts and permits exceed expectations, real estate sector outperforms.
events.correlation: Housing strength adds to economic optimism

events.title: Volatility Index Normalizes
events.description: VIX falls from crisis levels as market stress indicators return to normal ranges.
events.correlation: Fear gauge normalization supports recovery

events.title: Corporate Buyback Activity Surges
events.description: Companies announce increased share repurchase programs following oversold market conditions.
events.correlation: Buyback support adds technical buying pressure

events.title: Foreign Investment Flows Return
events.description: International institutional investors resume U.S. equity purchases after tariff pause.
events.correlation: Foreign buying supports recovery momentum

events.title: Memorial Day Weekend Optimism
events.description: Pre-holiday trading shows continued optimism as summer trading season approaches.
events.correlation: Seasonal patterns support late-May strength

events.title: January Effect in Full Swing
events.description: Traditional January market optimism drives continued buying across all sectors.
events.correlation: Seasonal buying patterns support early year gains

events.title: Quarter-End Rebalancing
events.description: Institutional portfolio rebalancing creates mixed trading volumes ahead of Q1 close.
events.correlation: Technical rebalancing flows before major event

events.title: End of Month Portfolio Adjustment
events.description: May portfolio rebalancing and Memorial Day holiday create mixed trading patterns.
events.correlation: Month-end flows ahead of June volatility

events.title: June Market Uncertainty
events.description: Markets show signs of uncertainty entering June as traders assess policy outlook and economic data.
events.correlation: Major reversal suggests new uncertainty emerging
